English
Heli, a factory worker in rural Mexico must try and protect his young family when
his 12 year old sister inadvertently involves them in the brutal drug world when she
agrees to look after some cocaine found by her older boyfriend. When the drug cartel
want their drugs back they go after the boyfriend and Heli's young family.
